column1: In comments page, for the Reply function, the comment is not being updated and replied
column26:
In the Reply function , comment is not being updated and replied on clicking reply button

Steps to reproduce:

# Navigate to the application 
# In the comments page, navigate to any comment which is to be replied
# Select reply option and a 
reply to comment box appears.
# Edit the comment and select the reply button
# Verify the updated reply is displayed or not

Expected Results:

The updated reply should be displayed on selecting reply button

Actual results:

The updated reply is not displayed on selecting reply button but after refreshing the page it is being displayed

!ss_reply.png|width=50%!

In comments page, for the Quick Edit function, the comment is not being updated
column26:
In the Quick edit function , comment is not being updated on clicking update comment

Steps to reproduce:
1. Navigate to the application 
2. In the comments page, navigate to any comment which is to be editted.

3. Select quick edit option and an edit comment box appears.

4. Edit the comment and select the update comment button

5. Verify the updated comment is displayed or not

Expected Results:

The updated comment should be displayed on selecting update comment button

Actual results:

The updated comment is not displayed on selecting update comment button but after refreshing the page it is being displayed

column1: To verify pagination functionality of the current page
To verify default count of records on page
As a user I want to verify pagination functionality so that I'm able to maintain  default count of records on all pages
column26:
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page , in the top right corner from the screen options , I can view the pagination option.
* In the pagination action if I select the no of items to be shown in that current page and select apply , the chosen no of items are displayed in that page.
* In the comments page, I can verify the previous page button is disabled in first page and next page button is disabled in last page.
* In the comments page, I verify that total no of items present in all pages is displayed on top right position above the comments as “____ items”

column1: Verify "delete permanently" functionality to permanently delete each comment
Verify "delete permanently" functionality to delete each comment permanently
Verify "Empty spam" functionality to permanently delete all spam comments
Verify "not spam" functionality to restore spam comments in all comments section
Verify "mark as spam" functionality
As an admin I want  to perform "mark as spam" function so that I can spam irrelevant commments
column26:
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page ,  select the comments to be spammed and if I select “mark as spam” option from bulk actions and select apply button, spammed comments are moved to spam section.
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page , if I select the empty spam button all comments in spam are permanently deleted.
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page ,  select the comments to be deleted,  and if I select “delete permanently” option that selected comment will be deleted permanently.
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page ,  select the comments to be not spammed and if I select “not spam” option from bulk actions and select apply button, not spammed comments are moved to all comments section.

column1: Verify "mark as spam" for comments in trash comment section
Verify "Empty Trash" functionality to permanently delete all comments from trash
Verify restore functionality to restore comments from trash to all comments section
Verify "Move to Trash" functionality to delete comments
Verify quick edit functionality
Verify edit functionality
Verify filter functionality when selected type of comment is not present
Verify filter functionality when comment type is "all comment types"
Verify filter functionality when comment type is "ping"
Verify filter comment functionality when the comment type is "comment"
Verify view property type attachment functionality
Verify view post type attachment functionality
As I user I want to view the attachment type so that I'm able to view attachment type for the respective comment
column26:
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page , and if I select the “view the post” for the respective comment, the post showing the attachment post and the comments are displayed.
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page , and if I select the “view the property” for the respective comment, the post showing  the attachment property and  the comments are displayed.
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page , and if I select the “view the attachment” for the respective comment, the post showing  the attachment image and  the comments are displayed.

Verify unapprove functionality
Verify approve functionality

Verify when user enters the string
in the search comment box & clicks search comment
similar results should appear under the result section

column1: Verify search functionality of comments by IP address of author
Verify search functionality of comments by email id of author
Verify search functionality of comments by name of author
Verify Bulk actions are not perfomed  for null selection
Verify user can select multiple checkboxes
As a user I want to perform reply action so that I'm able to reply to comments
column26:
* Given that I a registered user, I navigate to the comments page , and select the reply option to reply to the respective comment, a reply box appears
* In the reply box, I type the reply and I can select from the given editting options like, text formatting , insert image/link, ordered/unordered list, close tags , and if I select reply, the updated reply is displayed.

column1: As an admin I should be able to  approve/unapprove comments so that I'm able to display only relevant comments publicly
column26:
* Given that I am an admin, I navigate to the comments page , select the comments to be approved and select the approve option from bulk actions and if I select apply button, the comments are approved and displayed in the main application
* Given that I am an admin, I navigate to the comments page , select the irrelevant comments to be unapproved and select the unapprove option from bulk actions and if I select apply button, the comments are unapproved and moved to the pending list.

column1: As a user I should be able to delete comments so that I'm able to remove irrelevant comments
column26:
* Given that I’m a registered user I navigate to the comments page ,  select the comments to be deleted and if I select “move to trash” option from bulk actions and select apply button, the comments are moved to trash section.
* In the  trash comment section, the deleted comment  can be restored , deleted permanently, or marked as spam.
* In the comments page, in the trash section , if the “empty trash” button is selected , it permanently deletes all the comments from the trash section.

column1: As a user I should be able to perform edit/quick edit action so that I'm able to edit and update the comments
column26:
* Given that I am a registered user, I navigate to the comments page and select the edit option to edit.
* In the edit comment box, I can select from given editting options like, text formatting , insert image/link, ordered/unordered list, close tags , and modify comment in  status box  and if I select update the updated comment is displayed in all comments section.
* Given that I am a registered user, I navigate to the comments page and select the quick edit option to edit.
* In the edit comment box, I can select from given editting options like, text formatting , insert image/link, ordered/unordered list, close tags and if I select update the updated comment is displayed in all comments section.

column1: As I user I want to filter the type of comments so that I'm able to view the required type of comment
column26:
* Given that I am a registered user, I navigate to the comments page and in the filter comments box, if I select comment type, list of “comment type” comments is filtered and displayed.
* Given that I am a registered user, I navigate to the comments page and in the filter comments box, if I select ping type, list of “ping type“ comments is filtered and displayed.
* Given that I am a registered user, I navigate to the comments page and in the filter comments box, if I select all comments type , list of all types of comments is filtered and displayed.
* Given that I am a registered user, I navigate to the comments page and in the filter comments box, if I select any comment type and that type of comments are not present, nothing is displayed

column1: Verify search functionality of comments by any string of required comment
column26:
* Given that I am a registered user,  I navigate to the comments page and in the search comment box, if I type the name of author, his/her comments are displayed containing that name
* Given that I am a registered user,  I navigate to the comments page and in the search comment box, if I type the IP address of the author, his/her comments are displayed containing that Ip address.
*   Given that I am a registered user,  I navigate to the comments page and in the search comment box, if I type the  email id of the author, his/her comments are displayed containing that email id.
*  Given that I am a registered user,  I navigate to the comments page and in the search comment box, if I type the part/string of my required comment, a list of comments containing that string is displayed.

column1: As a user I want to perform Bulk action so that I can modify multiple comments at once
column26:
* Given that I am a registered user, if I navigate to the comments page, I can select multiple checkboxes to the respective comments and can perform bulk actions on multiple comments at once.
* Given that I am a registered user, if I navigate to the comments page, for null selection bulk actions are not performed
* Given that I am a registered user, if I navigate to the comments page, and click on select all function, all comments are selected at once
